EmailTemplate.subject: New Contact Information for DuPont™ Kevlar® and Nomex®
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Effective February 22, 2016, the DuPont Corporate Inside Sales team will begin managing the account for {!Account.Name} in support of our Nomex® and Kevlar® products. Your account and contact information has been fully transitioned into our databases.
DuPont Corporate Inside Sales is an in-house leveraged service provider of sales, marketing and customer relationship management solutions. Our team is located at the DuPont Corporate Headquarters site in Wilmington, Delaware.
Ginger Brown, Tanita Powell and Asia Walden have been assigned as your account representatives going forward. One of these individuals will be contacting you shortly to introduce themselves and to discuss your current applications and ongoing need for our products.
Our representatives are available Monday through Friday from 8:00am-5:00pm EST. You may reach us on our toll-free number at 1-877-713-1299 or via email at
corporate.inside-sales@dupont.com.
Thank you for your business and your continued interest in our products.
Sincerely,
DuPont Corporate Inside Sales
Please Note: If you are placing or checking on an order, please contact Customer Service directly toll-free at 1-888-847-1631 or via email DPTAramidsDom@dupont.com.
